text: Philippe Vandevelde, working under the pseudonym Tome (24 February 1957 - 5 October 2019), was a Belgian comics script writer. He was known for works with Janry on Spirou et Fantasio and Le Petit Spirou, and with Luc Warnant and later Bruno Gazzotti on Soda. He also worked with Ralph Meyer on Berceuse assassine, and with Marc Hardy on Feux. Earlier in his career he was an assistant-artist for Dupa. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Belgian artists Category:Writers from Brussels Category:Comics artists
